page.title: 13INTERVIEW cont:
page.content:
lambing, harvesting and spraying and it is usually about nine o'clock when he gets in. When I could not drive it was a problem doing my shopping because there is no bus, the only bus there is, is the school bus which stops about a quarter to eight and returns at about four o'clock. I love living here because of the peace, the quietness and the privacy. My husband and I prefer the country life to urban life. The time in the farming year which I dislike the most is harvest; Alister,my husband gets up really early and gets home very late."
This is how a typical farmer's wife lives.She is obviously happy and contented in her job and where she lives.
